item.name: User

request.description:
Send a request to server to get all Users from DB.

### Response data:

400 - http.StatusBadRequest

500 - http.StatusInternalServerError

if OK:

200 - http.StatusOK

JSON massieve:

\[

{   

"userId": int,   

"email": string,   

"role": string,    

"verified": bool,          

"name": string,          

"sName": string,             

"mName": string,               

"sex": string,   

"birthDate": time.Time,     # format: "2111-01-01" #   

"address": string,             

"phone": string,             

"photo": string            

},

{user JSON...},

{user JSON...},

...

\]

Return user from DB by userID. ID need to be set in URL params api/user/{id}

### Response data:

400 - http.StatusBadRequest

500 - http.StatusInternalServerError

if OK:

200 - http.StatusOK

JSON:

{

"userId": int,

"email": string,

"role": string,

"verified": bool,

"name": string,

"sName": string,

"mName": string,

"sex": string,

"birthDate": time.Time, # format: "2111-01-01" #

"address": string,

"phone": string,

"photo": string

}

item.description:
## User's struct:

| Field | type | JSON |
| --- | --- | --- |
| UserID | int | userId |
| Email | string | "email" |
| Password | string | "password" |
| Role | string | "role" |
| Verified | bool | "verified" |
| Name | string | "name |
| Surname | string | "sName" |
| MiddleName | string | "mName" |
| Sex | string | "sex" |
| DateOfBirth | time.Time | "birthDate" |
| Address | string | "address" |
| Phone | string | "phone |
| Photo | string | "photo" |

request.description:
Create user. Giving back ID for user. If registration was successufull send email verification to user. If verification will be done changes verifiend field to true

## Request data:

JSON

{

"email": string,

"password": string,

"role": string, NOT NULL # "client", "employee", "anonymous" #

"verified": bool, NOT NULL

"name": string, NOT NULL

"sName": string, NOT NULL

"mName": string,

"sex": string, NOT NULL

"birthDate": time.Time, NOT NULL # format: "2111-01-01" #

"address": string,

"phone": string, NOT NULL

"photo": string

}

### Response data:

400 - http.StatusBadRequest

500 - http.StatusInternalServerError

if OK:

201- http.StatusCreated

JSON:

{

"userId": int

}

SImple login endpoint. Checks first if usser already logged in. If true return msg by response writer.

### Request data:

{

Email string NOT NULL

Password string NOT NULL

}

Response data:

400 - StatusBadRequest

422- StatusUnprocessableEntity

500 - StatusInternalServerError

if OK:

200 - http.StatusOK

Cookie: Refresh-Token

Header: access_token

#### JSON:

{

"userId": int,

"email": string,

"role": string,

"verified": bool,

"name": string,

"sName": string,

"mName": string,

"sex": string,

"birthDate": time.Time, # format: "2111-01-01" #

"address": string,

"phone": string,

"photo": string

}

Who Am I endpoin. Checks if user is authorized by using access token. If true giving back userId and user role. if false send msg that user is unauthorized

### Request data:

Authorization Bearer Token

### Response data:

401-StatusUnauthorized

200- http.StatusOK  
{

"userId": int,

"role": string

}

Creates new access and refresh tokens and sends them back by header(access) and cookie(refresh). Needed valid refresh token

### Request data:

Cookie: Refresh-Token

### Response data:

401 - StatusUnauthorized  
422 - StatusUnprocessableEntity

402 - StatusOK

Cookie: Refresh-Token

Header: access_token

### Request data:

Authorization Bearer Token

### Response data:

401 - StatusUnauthorized  
  
200 - StatusOK

Cookie: Refresh-Token - null

Header: access_token - null

item.name: Room

request.description:
Send a request to server to get all Rooms from DB.

### Response data:

400 - http.StatusBadRequest

500 - http.StatusInternalServerError

if OK:

200 - http.StatusOK

JSON massieve:

\[

{

"roomId": 1,

"roomNum": 101,

"petType": "Cat",

"hotelId": 1,

"roomPhotoUrl": "roomPhotoUrl"

},

....

\]

Return roomfrom DB by roomID. ID need to be set in URL params api/room/{id}

### Response data:

400 - http.StatusBadRequest

500 - http.StatusInternalServerError

if OK:

200 - http.StatusOK

JSON:

{

"roomId": 1,

"roomNum": 101,

"petType": "Cat",

"hotelId": 1,

"roomPhotoUrl": "roomPhotoUrl"

}

item.description:
| **Field** | **type** | **JSON** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| RoomID | int | roomId |
| RoomNumber | int | roomNum |
| PetType | string | petType |
| HotelID | int | hotelId |
| RoomPhotoURL | string | roomPhotoUrl |
